name: attaboy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to praise someone, especially a man or boy, or to encourage them to continue: He believes he can win. Attaboy! Attaboy, what a great start!
used to praise a male animal or to encourage it to do something : Attaboy! Good work!
More examplesFewer examplesAttaboy, Johnny, help your sister out.Attaboy, you tell her!He uses Americanisms such as "holy smoke!" and "attaboy!" very effectively.
